en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Benigno N. Ricafort, President & CEO, Clark Development Corporation, Philippines!
en.content: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Benigno N. Ricafort, President & CEO of Clark Development Corporation, Philippines (which operates Clark Freeport and Airport). Benigno was a former Rotary District Governor of Metro Manila. He is seen here doing demos with FE's Quantum Pendant together with FE's CEO Paul Ting, Thai Country Licensee, Don Chan, PD Art Medina, PD Judge Medina and FE Leader Mae Heredia (Architect). Benigno was with FE to discuss the "Hope For Children" Charity Drive initiated by FE.
